creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: abstract biomorphic slightly asymmetrical form in variegated shades of rose, grey and yellow-green; grey and white ground of looping and radiating parallel curved lines, with some shades of green and rose around center
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Misty Dance
